attributes.background: On recently turning 18, I have noticed the extortionate price of Beer in Pubs. This must change, and is a view shared by the good working, and drinking, people of Britain!

rejection.details: The Government can't determine how pubs or breweries price their beer. But the Government is responsible for duties (taxes) on alcohol. You could start a new petition calling on the Government to lower alcohol duties on drinks served in pubs.
